summary: Adding temporal T axioms (reflexive G/H) enables use of Mathlib ClosureOperator/Nucleus infrastructure, reducing algebraic implementation from 1500-2500 to 800-1200 lines. The 4 coherence sorries in IndexedMCSFamily largely disappear with reflexivity since the T axiom provides direct local constraints.

artifacts.summary: Analysis of reflexive temporal operators enabling fully algebraic representation theorem via Mathlib closure operator infrastructure
